title: History of the Ghazal with @PersianPoetics
itunes:author: Zirrar
itunes:summary:
What is the Ghazal? Where did it start and to where did it travel? PersianPoetics (Sharghzadeh) and I discuss the beautiful structure of the Ghazal and its most famous poets from Attar, Mawlana Rumi, Hafez and Attar to Ghalib, Iqbal and modern poets.

Follow Sharghzadeh on Instagram @persianpoetics

description:
What is the Ghazal? Where did it start and to where did it travel? PersianPoetics (Sharghzadeh) and I discuss the beautiful structure of the Ghazal and its most famous poets from Attar, Mawlana Rumi, Hafez and Attar to Ghalib, Iqbal and modern poets.

Follow Sharghzadeh on Instagram @persianpoetics
